snippet: Álvaro Uribe, one of the most vocal critics of peace negotiations between the government and the country’s main guerrilla group, was elected to the Senate.
abstract: Voters in Colombia elect former Pres Alvaro Uribe to Senate, increasing influence of one of most vocal critics of peace negotiations between government and country’s main rebel group, Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia.
lead_paragraph: Álvaro Uribe, one of the most vocal critics of peace negotiations between the government and the country’s main guerrilla group, was elected to the Senate.

headline.main: Ex-President Wins a Seat in Colombia
headline.print_headline: Ex-President Wins a Seat in Colombia
